description.value:
Requirements You are wielding a Samurai Weapon

You use the flat or the back of the blade with unparalleled brutality. Make a Strike with the versatile B trait. If you hit, the victim must make a @Check[fortitude|against:class] saving throw, with the DC being 2 higher if the initial Strike is a critical success.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of its next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} until the end of its next turn.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4} until the end of its next turn.
